name: I’m looking forward to the Apple Journal app. It scratches an itch that I’ve had for years. Biggest question is data portability. I’d like to sync my journal entries to my website, either as public or private posts. Crossing my fingers for an API or Shortcuts support.

content.html: I’m looking forward to the Apple Journal app. It scratches an itch that I’ve had for years. Biggest question is data portability. I’d like to sync my journal entries to my website, either as public or private posts. Crossing my fingers for an API or Shortcuts support.

summary: @jonathan totally agree. add in some markdown support too… ;)
